title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Mastering Academic Integrity: Mobile-Based Micro-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three cases of academic misconduct and explain appropriate countermeasures

Learners can use an academic integrity checklist to write self-assessment reports
